main event: Citizens (mother and daughter) reported seeing a strange square object, traveling very slowly and making a vapor trail, at 3:30 PM on December 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as a strange square object.
The object was traveling very slowly.
The object was making a vapor trail.
The witness was a part-time scientist.
The report notes that Mr. Raveaden will call the UFO Office the following morning.
